description: Details of noise mitigation measures pursuant to condition 6 of Planning Permission Ref:P/2013/4791 Dated: 23/12/2013 for the variation of condition 10 (parking permit restriction) of planning permission ref. P/2013/2848 dated 23/08/2013 to restrict the 3 x six-bedroom houses to 2 parking permits each (as opposed to the one parking permit each as previously approved) for Retention of existing residential floor space (Class C3) and change of use of the building from hostel (Sui Genuris) to create seven (7) residential (Class C3) units comprising of 4 x 2 bedroom flats, 3 x 6 bedroom houses, the erection of a two-storey rear extension and alterations to the front elevation, including the reinstatement of front staircase and entrance, the rationalisation of the existing bin stores, installation of new boundary fencing / railing / gates: the reinstatement of a chimney stack; installation of rooflight window and the replacement of an existing window with a new doorway on the front (northwest) elevation
